        public static Object parse2dArray(Class<?> type,
                                  String text)
                           throws XmlParseException
        parse an array of arrays: rows separated by ; and columns separated by ,
        Parameters:
        type - of the elements of the main array. This would be an Array[]. That is this class.getComponentType() would be a primitive.
        text - to be parsed
        Returns:
        array[][] that is parsed from text value
        Throws:
        XmlParseException - for any issue while parsing the text

      • parseToParts

        public static String[] parseToParts(String textWithFieldNames)
        parse into parts where [0] is the text before first variable, [1] is the first fieldName, [2] is next constant between first and second field name etc.. [last] is the constant after the last field name. This array can be used used to optimize substitution of values at run time
        Parameters:
        textWithFieldNames - text that may contain one or more ${...} in it.
        Returns:
        null if the text has no field names in it. array, with a minimum of three elements. You may supply this as argument to substituteParts() constants

      • substituteFields

        public static String substituteFields(String textWithFieldNames,
                                      FieldsInterface fieldValues)
        return a text value that is formed by substituting ${...} field names in the input with their values from the collection
        Parameters:
        textWithFieldNames -
        fieldValues -
        Returns:
        resultant text

      • substituteFields

        public static String substituteFields(String[] textParts,
                                      FieldsInterface fieldValues)
        return a text value that is formed by substituting fields in the parts with their values from the collection
        Parameters:
        textParts - that was returned by a call to parseToParts
        fieldValues -
        Returns:
        resultant text

        Parameters:
        pattern -
        Returns:

      • getFileName

        public static String getFileName(String filePattern,
                                 String inName,
                                 FieldsInterface fields)
        if the pattern is $fieldName, then the value of field name from fields collection is returned

        replace place holders in name pattern. {name} is replaced with the file name while {ext} is replaced with file extension. Note that extension does not include '.' example 

         with inName = a.txt
 {name}.out -> a.out
 {name}.{ext}.out -> a.txt.out
 b{ext} ->bout

 with inName = a
 {name}.out -> a.out
 {name}.{ext}.out -> a..out
 b{ext} ->b
        Parameters:
        filePattern - can not be null
        inName - can be null;
        fields -
        Returns:
        file name after replacing place-holders, if any

        Returns:
        Base64 encrypted string
